languages.text: "Знай же, дух машины, ангел Деус Механикус... ибо видел я... сам {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензор{/g}... вырывал Плоть у наших техносоратников... и служил литанию над вместилищами скверны... саркофагами, скованными из оскверненного металла... нечистыми оболочками для зла!" {n}Мученик издает слабый вой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Знай же, дух машины, ангел Деус Механикус... ибо видел я... сам Фабрикатор... вырывал Плоть у наших технобратьев... и служил литанию над вместилищами скверны... Скованные из оскверненного металла, саркофаги для Извечного врага! Нечистые порождения... запертые внутри священных машин..." {n}Мученик издает слабый вой.{/n}

languages.text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Знай же, дух машины, ангел Деус Механикус... ибо видел я... сам {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензор{/g}... вырывал Плоть у наших техносоратников... и служил литанию над вместилищами скверны... саркофагами, скованными из оскверненного металла... нечистыми оболочками для зла!" {n}Мученик издает слабый вой.{/n}

"Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

languages.text: “机魂啊，万机之神的天使啊……我看到……{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}本人……将实肉从我的技术伙伴们身上撕了下来……他在腐化的容器旁念念有词……他站在腐败的金属铸成的棺柩旁边……那是用来容纳邪恶的不洁外壳！”{n}他发出了一声微弱的低吼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “机魂啊，万机之神的天使啊……我看到……{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}本人……将实肉从我的技术伙伴们身上撕了下来……他在腐化的容器旁念念有词……他站在腐败的金属铸成的棺柩旁边……那是用来容纳邪恶的不洁外壳！”{n}他发出了一声微弱的低吼。{/n}

languages.text: «Ha de saber, espíritu máquina, ángel del Deus Mechanicus... que yo vi... al propio {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}... arrancarles la carne a nuestros tecnocamaradas... mientras cantaba una letanía sobre sus vasijas de corrupción... sarcófagos forjados de metal corrupto... ¡cascarones impíos diseñados para alojar el mal!». {n}Deja escapar un débil aullido.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ha de saber, espíritu máquina, ángel del Deus Mechanicus... que yo vi... al propio {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g}... arrancarles la carne a nuestros tecnocamaradas... mientras cantaba una letanía sobre sus vasijas de corrupción... sarcófagos forjados de metal corrupto... ¡cascarones impíos diseñados para alojar el mal!». {n}Deja escapar un débil aullido.{/n}

languages.text: 「聞いてくれ、機械精霊よ、デウス・メカニクスの天使よ…見たんだ…{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}が、その手で…技術同胞の、真なる肉体を…引き剥がし…そして、何度も呪文を唱えて、いた…腐敗の器に…腐敗した金属で、作った棺…悪を納める、不浄な器…！」{n}男は弱々しく訴えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「聞いてくれ、機械精霊よ、デウス・メカニクスの天使よ…見たんだ…{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}が、その手で…技術同胞の、真なる肉体を…引き剥がし…そして、何度も呪文を唱えて、いた…腐敗の器に…腐敗した金属で、作った棺…悪を納める、不浄な器…！」{n}男は弱々しく訴えた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wisset, Maschinengeist, Engel des Deus Mechanicus ... dass ich ... den {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} selbst gesehen habe ... wie er das Fleisch aus unseren Tech-Kameraden riss ... und eine Litanei über Gefäßen der Korruption sang ... Sarkophagen, geschmiedet aus korruptem Metall ... unheilige Hüllen, die das Böse beherbergen sollen!" {n}Ein schwaches Heulen entringt sich seiner Kehle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wisset, Maschinengeist, Engel des Deus Mechanicus ... dass ich ... den {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} selbst gesehen habe ... wie er das Fleisch aus unseren Tech-Kameraden riss ... und eine Litanei über Gefäßen der Korruption sang ... Sarkophagen, geschmiedet aus korruptem Metall ... unheilige Hüllen, die das Böse beherbergen sollen!" {n}Ein schwaches Heulen entringt sich seiner Kehle.{/n}

languages.text: « Sachez, esprit de la machine, ange du Deus Mechanicus... que j'ai vu... le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} en personne... arracher la chair de nos technoconfrères... et psalmodier une litanie sur des réceptacles de corruption... des sarcophages de métal corrompu... des conteneurs impies conçus pour abriter le mal ! »{n}dit-il en gémissant faiblement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sachez, esprit de la machine, ange du Deus Mechanicus... que j'ai vu... le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} en personne... arracher la chair de nos technoconfrères... et psalmodier une litanie sur des réceptacles de corruption... des sarcophages de métal corrompu... des conteneurs impies conçus pour abriter le mal ! »{n}dit-il en gémissant faiblement.{/n}

languages.text: "Makine ruhu, Deus Mechanicus'un meleği... Şahidim olsun... Bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}... Tekno yoldaşlarımızdan Suret'i söküyor... Cesetlere yozluk dolu ayinler... Yozlaşmış metalden lahitler... Kötülüğü barındırmak için tasarlanmış kabuklar!.." {n}Zayıf bir uluma sesi çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Know, machine spirit, angel of the Deus Mechanicus... that I saw... the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} himself... ripping the Flesh out of our tech-comrades... and chanting a litany over vessels of corruption... sarcophagi forged from corrupted metal... unholy shells designed to house evil!" {n}He lets out a weak howl.{/n}

Cesetlere yozluk dolu ayinler... Yozlaşmış metalden lahitler... Kötülüğü barındırmak için tasarlanmış kabuklar!.." {n}Zayıf bir uluma sesi çıkarıyor.{/n}
